I saw you jog in the park yesterday.
It is my hobby to jog in the park.
Jogging every day is good for our health.
What do you want to be when you grow up?
It is my future dream to be a nurse.
I like taking care of the sick.
It's a good idea. I saw you helping an old woman a few days ago.
I'm sure you will be a good nurse.
I heard you play the piano yesterday. You played very well.
Thanks. Being a pianist is my wish.
